# Deep Skill

This skill is nested several directories deep to test subpath discovery.

## Purpose

Tests:
- Recursive directory scanning
- Subpath-based discovery
- Path resolution in nested structures
- Performance with deep trees

## Location

Located at: `level1/level2/skills/deep-skill/SKILL.md`

## Features

- Deep nesting test
- Subpath discovery validation
